DOC.brief_summary: To modeling the pharmacokinetic-pharmacodynamic(PK-PD) simulation with the plasma concentration and the transporter occupancy from OCD patients treated with escitalopram. To examine the effect of G2677T/A single nucleotide polymorphism(SNP) of ABCB1 gene to the PK-PD modeling in OCD patients treated with escitalopram.
DOC.brief_title: Modeling Between Plasma Concentration and Serotonin Transporter Occupancy Induced by Escitalopram in Obsessive-compulsive Disorder(OCD) Patients
DOC.detailed_description: To measure plasma concentration of escitalopram in OCD patients treated with escitalopram. To measure serotonin transporter occupancy by escitalopram in OCD patients treated with escitalopram. To genotype G2677T/A SNP of ABCB1 gene in OCD patients treated with escitalopram.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of OCD based on Diagnostic and Statistical Manual(DSM)IV criteria no change of escitalopram dosage in 6 weeks psychiatric comorbidity other than OCD History of head injury, epilepsy, other general medical disorder
